product_name: The North Face Expedition Zip Neck Long Underwear Top - Men's
long_description: Made for very cold weather, The North Face Expedition Zip Neck heavyweight men's long underwear top provides quick-drying comfort with FlashDry(TM) fabric. The zip front allows quick ventilation. Heavyweight moisture-wicking polyester and polyolefin fabric features FlashDry(TM) microparticles embedded in the fabric to dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut husks and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive will not wash out. You'll move without restriction thanks to the stretchy fabric and flat seams, which are designed to enhance motion. The North Face Expedition Zip Neck long underwear top offers a next-to-skin fit.
short_description: Made for very cold weather, The North Face Expedition Zip Neck heavyweight men's long underwear top provides quick-drying comfort with FlashDry(TM) fabric. The zip front allows quick ventilation.
